1084183098323947520.text:
Don't get over your skis. You think you're better than you are, and will take early encouragement as endorsement of expertise. (Thank you, @soopa)

You're on the right track, but you're not there yet. It's ok, we were all young once, and you'll have ever more to learn at 30!

1084182841133420544.text: Confront your biases and privilege. You work hard and have some skill, but you're as much a product of luck and environment as anything. You'll wish you started using your privilege for the benefit of others much sooner.

1084182810351583232.text: Be patient. With yourself, but especially with others. Remember how lucky you were to have someone take a chance and invest in you. (Thank you, @allanbranch)

1084182777283497984.text: Kill your pride. It has no place in life, and will hamper your ability to collaborate with others. The craft, pursuit of excellence, and output is what matters. Getting credit does not. (Thank you, @gentry)

1084182739341856768.text: Don't rely on your instincts; they'll be wrong more often than right. Being thoughtful and thorough, considering all of the consequences, will save you from binary thinking you are so prone to. (Thank you, @soopa)

1084182705233788929.text: Be kind. You won't believe how much of an advantage this is if you can figure it out. Above all, be kind. (Thanks @lekaplan)

1084182677727502336.text: Maintain a growth mindset. Be a self-reinventor. You'll make many mistakes, but that's ok because you can learn, change, and grow. (Thank you, @jeffholden)

1084182633595031553.text: Slow is smooth, smooth is fast. You're young and eager, but will trip over yourself often by valuing action and speed over thinking and planning. (Thank you, @stevenwalker)

1084182582462304256.text: You'll remember and regret every-time you thought for you to win or be right, a colleague had to lose or be wrong.

1084182539030323200.text: Your colleagues are not your competitors. Celebrate their success more than your own. Do everything you can to empower and uplift them. (Thank you, @jasonhopeful)

1084182501180923904.text: Ship, shipmate, self. Any success you find is because of a team. Being a great teammate is far more important than being right. (Thank you, @Soleio)
